price: 62. ¿Es esto (las bendiciones del Paraíso) mejor concesión o el árbol (infernal) de Zaqqum?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
